revision.comment: French: major cleanup: fix pronuns, remove unnecessary ones, remove ~ in subst specs; raw quotes -> {{ux}}/{{uxi}}/{{quote}}; {{ux|inline=1}} -> {{uxi}}; add {{place}}, {{lit}}; fix relational adjectives; remove unnecessary caps in defns; remove DEFAULTSORT; 'confer' in etyms -> 'compare'; clean up verlan terms; {{fr-adjective}} -> {{fr-adj}}; etc. (manually assisted)
